summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1998 NATIONAL TROPI-CAL.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR THE VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL.  FORD CONTINUES TO INFORM HER THAT THEY DO NOT HAVE THE PART AVAILABLE FOR THE RECALL REPAIR AND DO NOT KNOW WHEN IT WILL ARRIVE.  THERE HAD BEEN NO FAILURE TO DATE.  THE ENGINE SIZE, NUMBER OF CYLINDERS, RECALL NUMBER, AND POWERTRAIN WERE UNKNOWN.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 123,110.

TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A DOMETIC RM7732 (NA).  THE CONTACT SMELLED A STRONG AMMONIA ODOR AND NOTICED THAT THE BACK OF THE REFRIGERATOR WAS COVERED WITH YELLOW RESIDUE.  THE REFRIGERATOR WAS TURNED OFF.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE REFRIGERATOR DUE TO CRACKS THAT WERE LEAKING COOLANT.  HE RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 06E076000 (EQUIPMENT: RECREATIONAL VEHICLE).  THE CONTACT CALLED DOMETIC AND THE AUTOMATED SYSTEM STATED THAT HIS MODEL WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL, ALTHOUGH THE SERIAL NUMBER WAS INCLUDED.  THE CONTACT WAS NOT OFFERED ANY REIMBURSEMENT.  THE PART NUMBER AND LOCATION IN THE VEHICLE WERE UNAVAILABLE. UPDATED 02/14/08. *LJ   NOTE: AFTER APRIL 1, 2008,  CONSUMER WILL RESIDE @ 5114 SW SANDPINER DR. LEES SUMMIT MO. 64082.  UPDATED 02/14/08  *TR
